reviewText:
UGH
It's censored. If you're looking for the perv version, don't get this one.
I like anime porn a lot

This is not the same movie I remember seeing years ago, its been altered and much was deleted, like the remake of Old Boy it did not pack the same punch as the original; I do not recommend this version sadly because its original was far superior

I bought this after watching a fansub, because there was no other way to watch it online at the time. I enjoyed it thoroughly because I love completely blatant and unapologetic violence and graphic content, including the pornography aspect(as long as it tells the story). In this movie it was very important to the plot and I was really disappointed that it was heavily censored. I did not realize at the time of this purchase that this was censored at all, but it is... to a painful extent. It actually becomes hard to follow the story and understand everything that is going on because there is so much context missing. Its nothing less than frustrating. I don't recommend this copy at all.
Always liked this kind of anime.  There is no censorship of any kind.  Very good story and animation.  Also has some nudity.
Movie was awesome, it arrived on time and was in perfect condition, i have been waiting to watch this movie for a while
